column5: I would like to ask to the more seasoned fishermen if this Quantum accurist will be good for flipping and pitching, gear ratio is 7:1 with 50# power pro. thanks.
Agreed! When you're flipping and pitching, you want a fast retrieve ratio on your reel, and a big stick! The rod does the work, and the quick reel eats up the line.
thanks guys,the rod will be a Quantum XL 7'6" telescopic
I have one of those and it`s a fine reel!
It is a great reel for flippin and pitchin indeed. Great choice.
very good reels! had one on a st croix flipping stick.
